lore: The Spelljugglers were once hunted by the authorities, but their leaderâ€”who knows the law inside outâ€”managed to prove that they weren't a criminal organization.\n\nSpelljuggler Bedazzlers have a special ability; they can instantly sense the power of magical objects without needing to touch them. They can also influence these objects, changing their nature, but only if another Spelljuggler is the one wielding them.
menagerieDialog: (It's lazily floating a single spell orb above its palm.)
Watch as I juggle their lives away!
I know spells that would make your head spin... literally!
Can't hit what you can't catch! My defenses are impenetrable!
(It's tossing spells from hand to hand at dizzying speeds.)
name: Spelljuggler Bedazzler
